languages.text: "Камера Патента — древний, особо священный механизм, к которому с величайшим почтением относятся наши бортовые {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g}. Полагаю, если вы так или иначе разбудили Стража, вы активировали некие процессы... но тогда почему этого не происходило, когда то же самое проделывала Леди Теодора?" {n}Сенешаль хмурится.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Камера Патента — древний и весьма священный механизм, к которому с величайшим почтением относятся наши бортовые {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g}. Полагаю, если вы, так или иначе, разбудили Стража, вы активировали некие процессы... но тогда почему этого не происходило, когда то же самое проделывала Леди Теодора?" {n}Сенешаль хмурится.{/n}

languages.text: "The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} treat with the utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Камера Патента — древний, особо священный механизм, к которому с величайшим почтением относятся наши бортовые {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецы{/g}. Полагаю, если вы так или иначе разбудили Стража, вы активировали некие процессы... но тогда почему этого не происходило, когда то же самое проделывала Леди Теодора?" {n}Сенешаль хмурится.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} treat with utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

"The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} treat with utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

"The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} treat with utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

"The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} treat with utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

languages.text: “授状大厅是这艘飞船上古老而神圣的居所，船上的所有{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}都会以最崇高的敬意对待它。虽然不知道您做了什么，但我猜您一定是激活了某种程序，才让哨兵苏醒过来……可为什么西奥多拉夫人做类似事情的时候，从来都没发生过类似的情况呢？”{n}他皱起了眉头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} treat with the utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “许可证大厅是这艘飞船上古老而神圣的居所，船上的所有{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}都会以最崇高的敬意对待它。虽然不知道您做了什么，但我猜您一定是激活了某种程序，才让哨兵苏醒过来……可为什么西奥多拉夫人做类似事情的时候，从来都没发生过类似的情况呢？”{n}他皱起了眉头。{/n}

languages.text: «La sala de la Patente es un mecanismo antiguo y bastante sagrado que los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} de la nave tratan con la máxima reverencia. Asumo que de algún modo ha debido de activar algunos procesos que han dado como resultado el despertar del centinela... pero, en ese caso, ¿por qué no ocurrió nada similar cuando lady Theodora hizo lo mismo?». {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} treat with the utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La sala de la Patente es un mecanismo antiguo y bastante sagrado que los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} de la nave tratan con la máxima reverencia. Asumo que de algún modo ha debido de activar algunos procesos que han dado como resultado el despertar del centinela... pero, en ese caso, ¿por qué no ocurrió nada similar cuando lady Theodora hizo lo mismo?». {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n}

languages.text: 「令状部屋は、船の{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}が最大限の敬意を扱う、古代の神聖な機構です。あなたが何かをしたことで、特定の機能が起動し、センチネルを目覚めさせたんだと思います…しかしそれなら、どうしてシオドーラ様が同じことをした時は何も起こらなかったのでしょう？」{n}彼は眉をしかめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} treat with the utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「令状室は、船の{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}が最大限の敬意を持って扱う、古代の神聖な機構です。あなたが何かをしたことで、特定のプロセスが起動され、センチネルを目覚めさせたんだと思います…しかしそれなら、どうしてレディ・テオドラが同じことをした時は何も起こらなかったのでしょう？」 {n}彼は眉をしかめた。{/n}
「令状部屋は、船の{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}が最大限の敬意を扱う、古代の神聖な機構です。あなたが何かをしたことで、特定の機能が起動し、センチネルを目覚めさせたんだと思います…しかしそれなら、どうしてシオドーラ様が同じことをした時は何も起こらなかったのでしょう？」{n}彼は眉をしかめた。{/n}

languages.text: « La salle de la lettre de marque est un mécanisme ancien et sacré que les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} du vaisseau traitent avec la plus grande révérence. Quoi que vous ayez fait, vous avez dû activer certains processus qui auront réveillé cette sentinelle... Mais dans ce cas, pourquoi ne s'est-elle jamais montrée à dame Théodora ? » {n}Il fronce les sourcils.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} treat with the utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La salle de la lettre de marque est un mécanisme ancien et sacré que les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} du vaisseau traitent avec la plus grande révérence. Quoi que vous ayez fait, vous avez dû activer certains processus qui auront réveillé cette sentinelle... Mais dans ce cas, pourquoi ne s'est-elle jamais montrée à dame Théodora ? » {n}Il fronce les sourcils.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Handelsbriefkammer ist ein uralter und überaus heiliger Mechanismus, den die {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} des Schiffs mit höchster Ehrfurcht behandeln. Ich nehme an, was immer Ihr getan habt, hat bestimmte Prozesse aktiviert und den Wächter geweckt ... aber warum ist das nicht passiert, als Lady Theodora dasselbe getan hat?" {n}Er runzelt die Stirn.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} treat with the utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Handelsbriefkammer ist ein uralter und überaus heiliger Mechanismus, den die {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} des Schiffs mit höchster Ehrfurcht behandeln. Ich nehme an, was immer Ihr getan habt, hat bestimmte Prozesse aktiviert und den Wächter geweckt ... aber warum ist das nicht passiert, als Lady Theodora dasselbe getan hat?" {n}Er runzelt die Stirn.{/n}

languages.original_text: "The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's Tech-Priests treat with utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

languages.text: "Ruhsatname Odası, geminin {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahiplerinin{/g} azami hürmetle ilgilendikleri, kadim ve oldukça kutsal bir mekanizmadır. Tahminimce her ne yaptıysanız belli bir prosedürü devreye sokmuş ve Nöbetçi'nin uyanmasına sebep olmuş olmalısınız... Ancak Leydi Theodora da aynı şeyleri yapmıştı, o sırada neden bunlar meydana gelmedi?" {n}Kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Warrant Chamber is an ancient and rather sacred mechanism that the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} treat with the utmost reverence. I assume that, whatever it is that you did, you must have activated certain processes and caused the Sentinel to awaken... but then why did none of it happen when Lady Theodora did the same?" {n}He frowns.{/n}

Tahminimce her ne yaptıysanız belli bir prosedürü devreye sokmuş ve Nöbetçi'nin uyanmasına sebep olmuş olmalısınız... Ancak Leydi Theodora da aynı şeyleri yapmıştı, o sırada neden bunlar meydana gelmedi?" {n}Kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n}
